snippet: Padres shortstop Everth Cabrera was charged with resisting arrest after being stopped in San Diego in September for suspicion of driving under the influence of marijuana.
abstract: Tampa Bay Rays release a list of eight candidates for their open manager’s job; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Padres shortstop Everth Cabrera was charged with resisting arrest after being stopped in San Diego in September for suspicion of driving under the influence of marijuana.
